languages.text: "И вот... мы снова дома. Так странно возвращаться сюда без Леди Теодоры".
"And here we are... home once more. It is strange to return here without Lady Theodora."
languages.original_text: "И вот... мы снова дома. Так странно возвращаться сюда без Леди Теодоры".

traits.locale_text: "And here we are... home once more. It is strange to return here without Lady Theodora."
"And here we are... home once more. It is strange to return here without Lady Theodora."
"And here we are... home once more. It is strange to return here without Lady Theodora."
"And here we are... home once more. It is strange to return here without Lady Theodora."

languages.text: “我们到了……又到家了。回到这里，却见不到西奥多拉夫人，这种感觉真是古怪。”
languages.original_text: "And here we are... home once more. It is strange to return here without Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: “我们到了……又到家了。回到这里，却见不到西奥多拉夫人，这种感觉真是古怪。”

languages.text: «Y aquí estamos... de vuelta en casa. Se me hace extraño regresar sin lady Theodora».
languages.original_text: "And here we are... home once more. It is strange to return here without Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: «Y aquí estamos... de vuelta en casa. Se me hace extraño regresar sin lady Theodora».

languages.text: 「我らは再び、ここに至った。テオドラ女史なしでここに戻るのは、奇妙なものだがな」
languages.original_text: "And here we are... home once more. It is strange to return here without Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: 「我らは再び、ここに至った。テオドラ女史なしでここに戻るのは、奇妙なものだがな」

languages.text: "Und da wären wir ... wieder zu Hause. Es ist seltsam, ohne Lady Theodora hierher zurückzukehren."
languages.original_text: "And here we are... home once more. It is strange to return here without Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: "Und da wären wir ... wieder zu Hause. Es ist seltsam, ohne Lady Theodora hierher zurückzukehren."

languages.text: « Nous voilà... de retour chez nous. Comme c'est étrange d'être ici sans dame Théodora. »
languages.original_text: "And here we are... home once more. It is strange to return here without Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: « Nous voilà... de retour chez nous. Comme c'est étrange d'être ici sans dame Théodora. »

languages.text: "Geldik işte, yine evdeyiz. Leydi Theodora olmadan dönmek garip bir duygu."
languages.original_text: "And here we are... home once more. It is strange to return here without Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: "Geldik işte, yine evdeyiz. Leydi Theodora olmadan dönmek garip bir duygu."
